metadata.description: Select a valid scenario. Active Active: Two OPNSenses deployed in HA mode using SLB and ILB. Two Nics: Single OPNSense deployed with two Nics. Single Nic: Single OPNSense deployed with one Nic.
VM size, please choose a size which allow 2 NICs.
Virtual Nework Name. This is a required parameter to build a new VNet or find an existing one.
Use Existing Virtual Nework. The value must be new or existing.
Virtual Network Address Space. Only required if you want to create a new VNet.
Untrusted-Subnet Address Space. Only required if you want to create a new VNet.
Trusted-Subnet Address Space. Only required if you want to create a new VNet.
Untrusted-Subnet Name. Only required if you want to use an existing VNet and Subnet.
Trusted-Subnet Name. Only required if you want to use an existing VNet and Subnet.
Specify Public IP SKU either Basic (lowest cost) or Standard (Required for HA LB)"
URI for Custom OPN Script and Config
Only required in case of Deploying Windows VM. Windows Admin username (Used to login in Windows VM).
Only required in case of Deploying Windows VM. Windows Password (Used to login in Windows VM).
Existing Windows Subnet Name. Only requried in case of deploying Windows in a exising subnet.
In case of deploying Windows in a New VNet this will be the Windows VM Subnet Address Space
